 Your copy of CleanMyMac appears to be illegal and will be deactivated.
MacPaw is a small company, and we rely on CleanMyMac sales to keep developing it. Please support our company and CleanMyMac's improvements by getting your legal license.

This torrent does work, in that it does download, install and activate properly (with the keygen). 

HOWEVER! This will give you the error message
"Unfortunately you are using a pirated version. Please support us and buy a legal copy of CleanMyMac. Exclusively for you we offer a 50% discount right now."

THIS TORRENT/CRACK DOES NOT WORK!!!
Fully functional ... it is necessary to use Little snitch.

CleanMyMac 'calls home' when it is open, it checks the SN to see if it is one that is actually purchased.  If you don't block this call, it will de-activate itself.

To get around this, you will need to block the activation servers.

Add this to your hosts file:

127.0.0.1      www.macpaw.com
127.0.0.1      sn.macpaw.com
127.0.0.1      users.macpaw.com

Save it. Enjoy and avoid updating the software.
